dmca.title: [ABUSE] fraudulent domain and warez, music]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.
  
Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, January 03, 2006 1:29 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; pagol.chagol@gmail.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] fraudulent domain and warez, music]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] fraudulent domain and warez, music
Date: Tue, 3 Jan 2006 12:50:34 -0500
From: pagol chagol <pagol.chagol@gmail.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com

http://www.bangla-club.com/forum/modules.php?name=Forums

The above site illegally provides copyrighed music, video, movies.
Please have a look at the "Entertainment" category.
In addition, they're also providing warez, software cracks located under
"Tech" section.

And they've used fraudulent domain information you can check here:
http://whois.sc/bangla-club.com

There is no such address or name.
Please investigate these violations immediately.


- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/index.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.2 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFDutBfvK/XpJs6oyURAj8OAKCW+mFdT6s/550qDUQ6Zokuvs8ANgCgrc1B
od4QaF8k0cixiucT1a3o8+8=
=POTH
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
